description: Generate bound {{itemnames}} using your own RAM or unbound drops using tokens.
reqskdesc: In order to generate more than {{max}} {{itemnames}} automatically you must configure a Session Key. Go into Settings and click Enable Session Key to enable this feature.
signinfirst: You must be signed in to generate {{itemnames}}.
willsendto: to the Drops contract to purchase the required
bytesoframaccount: bytes of RAM from your account.
willusecontractbalance: bytes of RAM from your Drops contract balance.
